title: 97/588/EC: Commission Decision of 28 July 1997 amending Decision 95/328/EC establishing health certification for fishery products from third countries which are not yet covered by a specific decision (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 28 July 1997 amending Decision 95/328/EC establishing health certification for fishery products from third countries which are not yet covered by a specific decision (Text with EEA relevance) (97/588/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 4 of Decision 95/328/EC the words 'and for a period of two years` are hereby replaced by 'to 31 December 1998`.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 July 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 268, 24. 9. 1991, p. 15.
(2) OJ No L 125, 23. 5. 1996, p. 10.
(3) OJ No L 122, 14. 5. 1997, p. 21.
(4) OJ No L 232, 23. 8. 1997, p. 13.
(5) OJ No L 243, 11. 10. 1995, p. 17.
(6) OJ No L 13, 16. 1. 1997, p. 33.
(7) OJ No L 191, 12. 8. 1995, p. 32.
